column4: hello, can anyone tell me  why it is that everythig about my connection to the internet is blazing fast...other than my web surfing. it takes forever to look up the web pages and finally cnnect to them! lthough once i am connected the loading of the site goes fairly quick, it just takes way to long to find and resolve web  sites, does anyone know? is this a modem issue (DSL) or maybe an OS issue? because when i had cable inter
is it possible my ISP 'blocks' port 80 for some reeason?!
